name: Bridge Disaster -> Whistle Master
description:
You are the leader of a small village but suddendly all of you villagers are gone. Rescue them all but be careful. All the bridges are quite unstable and only a limited amount of people can use them at a time.

Controls with Mouse/Keyboard:

WASD to Walk

Space (hold) to whistle

Controls with Controller (here with Xbox Controller/other controllers should work as well)

Left Stick to Walk

X to whistle
